dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down problems into smaller parts, analyzing each component to find a solution.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and creative thinking to find innovative solutions.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through visual aids, such as diagrams and videos.
Your FarTwin will learn best through listening to lectures or discussions.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive to be the best and may come across as competitive or assertive.
Your FarTwin will prioritize teamwork and collaboration, working together for a common goal.

dimensions.label: Career Goals
dimensions.description: What career paths does your FarTwin aspire to?

options.description: Your FarTwin will aim for leadership positions, using their skills to guide and inspire others.
Your FarTwin will focus on innovation and finding new solutions to complex problems.

dimensions.label: Financial Attitude
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin view money?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving and living below their means.
Your FarTwin will be willing to spend freely, prioritizing generosity and helping others.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin approach time management?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize flexibility and adaptability, adjusting to changing circumstances.
Your FarTwin will prefer a structured schedule, with clear goals and deadlines.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin express emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will freely express their emotions, using verbal and non-verbal cues.
Your FarTwin will manage their emotions carefully, expressing them only when necessary.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin view risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out new and challenging experiences, embracing risk.
Your FarTwin will prioritize caution, carefully weighing the pros and cons before acting.
